features: Build stunning online stores, complete with mobile-friendly sliders and customized product pages.; Showcase your services with eye-catching layouts and engaging content.; Enhance customer service through the creation of custom contact forms, FAQs, and more.; Boost your website's SEO and performance with optimization techniques that cater to your specific content.; Seamlessly integrate third-party services like Google Maps and Mailchimp to elevate your website's functionality.; A selection of70,000pre made prompts to choose from!; Get 1,000+ new prompts weekly (automatically updated); Total courses:5 Mastery Courses including over 100 hours of material.; Who are you?I am Valdo, Notion creator & professional GPT-4 engineer.
